vote.title: Authorize delegation of approval for an assigned weighted value to price of not less than 36.9% of the total weighted value of all selection criteria for civil works projects utilizing Texas Government Code Chapter 2269 Subchapter D (Competitive Sealed Proposals) procurement method to department directors or their designated deputy or assistant directors - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
